response.original_title: Antropoceno en México: La sexta extinción
response.overview: An exploration of humanity's significant impact on the planet, highlighting our power to both create and destroy nature. It aims to raise awareness by showcasing successful conservation efforts in Mexico, a megadiverse country, and examining whether we have the tools to mitigate and reverse global warming for the sake of biodiversity and our own survival.
response.title: Anthropocene In Mexico: The Sixth Extinction

release_dates.note: Festival Cultura UNAM: CCU José Revueltas
